    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
function getZipContent(url){
var res=ByteArrayOutputStream();
var map= HashMap()
map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
var v1=java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
//java.log(v1)
var bis=ByteArrayInputStream(v1);
var zis=ZipInputStream(bis);
var entry=null;
 while((entry= zis.getNextEntry())!=null){
      if(entry.getName()=="chapter.json"){
        var buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
        var length;
        while ((length = zis.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                res.write(buffer, 0, length);
              }
        zis.closeEntry();
        
         
     }else{}
 }
return res.toString();



}
}
//java.log("SSSS"+baseUrl)
result=getZipContent(baseUrl)
//java.log(result);

</js>$.data[*]

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
    function getZipContent(url){
        let bOutput = ByteArrayOutputStream();
        let map = HashMap()
        map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
        let body = java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
        let bInput = ByteArrayInputStream(body);
        let zInput = ZipInputStream(bInput);
        while(zInput.getNextEntry()!=null){
            let buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
            let length;
            while ((length = zInput.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                bOutput.write(buffer, 0, length);
            }
            zInput.closeEntry();
        }
        return bOutput.toString("GBK");
    }
}
getZipContent(baseUrl)
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
function getZipContent(url){
var res=ByteArrayOutputStream();
var map= HashMap()
map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
var v1=java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
//java.log(v1)
var bis=ByteArrayInputStream(v1);
var zis=ZipInputStream(bis);
var entry=null;
 while((entry= zis.getNextEntry())!=null){
      if(entry.getName()=="chapter.json"){
        var buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
        var length;
        while ((length = zis.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                res.write(buffer, 0, length);
              }
        zis.closeEntry();
        
         
     }else{}
 }
return res.toString();



}
}
//java.log("SSSS"+baseUrl)
result=getZipContent(baseUrl)
//java.log(result);

</js>$.data[*]

bookSourceComment:
需关闭精准搜索

可搜索书名或作者名

关键词第一优先级为男女主角的准确名字
其它关键词为较频繁的龙套名或地点名、道具名、事件
多个关键词以空格分隔，页面只列出满足所有关键词的结果

可以在关键词前面加zj:表示搜索主角名
例如：zj:韩立

支持按后宫人数检索，数字1~20，超过20按20
例如：zj:韩立 hg:5，表示只列出后宫人数大于等于5的小说
可以设置人数区间，如：zj:韩立 hg:5~10
后宫人数可能不准确，建议放宽范围

bookSourceComment:
发现：全网排行
搜索：全网搜书
原网：直达原网

搜索关键字
──────
完全格式：书名#作者$网站
简化格式1：书名$网站
简化格式2：书名#作者
简化格式3：书名
简化格式4(夸克官方数据)：#作者
──────
目录排序：网站章节目录错乱的小说网站质量很差，对这种网站的小说目录重新排序浪费时间不值得，故夸克原网不对目录进行排序，如果想对目录排序请使用“夸克电脑”，夸克电脑对章节进行了重新排序
──────
注意事项：
①关键字前加“$”可启动动态加载，当内容为空时有奇效
②关键字前加“-”可让目录列表逆向排序，既逆向排序又动态加载时，前缀为“-$”
③关键字前加“@”将允许详情页自动跳转，如“@超神机械师$www.biquge.info”，目录中仅有“内容浏览”这个项目时，加“@”前缀有奇效。
既允许详情页自动跳转，又设置目录逆向排序、设置正文动态加载，则前缀为“@-$”

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

<js>
var Magua = new JavaImporter();
Magua.importPackage(
Packages.java.lang,
Packages.java.security,
);
with(Magua) {
  function strToMd5(str) {
    let md5 = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
    let bytes = md5.digest(String(str).getBytes());
    let stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();
    let bt = null;
    bytes.forEach(a => {
      bt = a & 0xff;
      if (bt < 16) {
        stringBuffer.append("0");
      }
      stringBuffer.append(Integer.toHexString(bt));
    });
    return stringBuffer.toString();
  }
}
function getSig(timestamp, params) {
  return strToMd5("45667191c50941a1a777dfbd84345fe8" + timestamp + params);
}

if (baseUrl.match("key=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("key=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  keyword: String(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("date=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("date=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: 39,
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0,
  date: parseInt(input[0])
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/infov1&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
 result= JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("id=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("id=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: parseInt(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0
  });
  var url =  "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/info&timestamp=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else {
  result=JSON.parse(result).data
}
JSON.stringify(result)
</js>$.[*]

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}
//DES解密结束


content=java.getString("$.content",false);
saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody",false);
say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话说：\n"+saybody:"";
if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){

result=String(decode(content)+say);
}else{result=content+say}
</js>

<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有items
if(JSON.parse(result).items){
json=JSON.parse(result).items;}

//加载作者搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/search?keyword='+key+'&type=2&page='+page+'&searchType=7&sortMode=DESC'));

//判定json里是否有items
if(json1.items){
json2=json1.items
}

//书名搜索列表与作者搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);


result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

var slect="i";

function convertChar(str) {
let index = sourceChars.indexOf(str)
if(index != -1) return displayChars[index]
}

var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).select('#txt');
doc.select(slect).toArray().forEach(ele=>{
let str = escape(ele.text());
ele.text(convertChar(str))
})
doc.select('h1').remove();doc.html()+'❌';
</js>

④把电话号码跟验证码的值删了【❗️填了电话号码会一搜索就发验证码】，保存书源*/

                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}



//获取验证码开始

}

java.log(JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).msg=="success"?"验证码发送成功，请注意短信":"验证码获取失败，请稍候再试");
}else if(y && !Token){
list2=[
 "mobile=86"+num,

option1={
"method": "POST",

}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/user/mobile-login,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
a=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
java.log(a.msg=="success"?'❗️下面是你的Token，请复制❗️\n'+a.data.user_token:JSON.stringify(a));
}
//获取验证码结束

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category'),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
   wordCount: o('.blue:eq(1)').replace('字',''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

function AES(input){
       rv = java.base64Decode(input);
       return rv;

if(result.match(/function AES\(input\)\{/)){
html=result.match(/['"](.*?)['"]\s+function AES\(input\)\{/)[1];
result=AES(html)
}else{
result=java.getString("//a[@href='javascript:;']/../following-sibling::div[1]@html",false)
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:lastest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="content".*?>([\s\S]*?)<\/div>\s*<\/div>/)[1]).html();
//取屏蔽段落
var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);
//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/#.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母
.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")
.replace(/\/\/126/g,"V")
.replace(/\/\/125/g,"U")
.replace(/\/\/124/g,"T")
.replace(/\/\/123/g,"S")
.replace(/\/\/122/g,"R")
.replace(/\/\/121/g,"Q")
.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")
.replace(/\/\/117/g,"O")
.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/113/g,"K")
.replace(/\/\/112/g,"J")
.replace(/\/\/111/g,"I")
.replace(/\/\/110/g,"H")
.replace(/\/\/107/g,"G")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/100/g,"@")
//小写字母
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/防采集.*阅读模式！/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/禁止转码.*阅读模式！/g,"")
</js>

搜索用户格式
@用户名

搜索合集格式（合集的作者名是blogname）
#合集
搜用户，合集时请关闭精确搜索

为防止大家的<发现地址规则>被清楚，所以书源url加了个1，不会覆盖旧书源（此书源改了搜索规则）
请大家把自己旧书源的<发现地址规则>粘贴到这里以后，自行修改一下🏷标签的url，
将,之前的网址改成
https://api.lofter.com/oldapi/tagPosts.api?product=lofter-android-6.11.1

关耳（正文图片不能加载的，建议用订阅源）

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/zongheng/)){var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
}

else if (baseUrl.match(/lemonyd/)){var bookId = baseUrl.match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .data.rf.filter(o => !o.name.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.name.replace(/^正文\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'https://biz.lemonyd.com/book/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId
   };
  });
}

else {doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result.replace(/(立即|开始)阅读(记录|)|(\[|↑)*(正|倒|顺)序(\]|↓)*|(章节|返回)(目录|主页|)|(我的|加入|)书架|(首|尾)页|玄幻(奇幻|小说|)|(现代|)都市(言情|)|(最新|)TXT下载|其他|推荐|用这款(APP|app).*?准确.|↓直达页面底部↓|上一页|查看全部/g,''));

a=list.toArray().reverse().map(x=>({name:x.text(),

bookSourceComment:
①可搜索文章名、作者名、主角配角名和其它关键字里包含该关键字的文章，搜索结果按作品收藏数排序，不局限于书名或作者
②发现的标签均为言情，且标签很多，可自行增删改，只要链接是晋江网页版的就行
③搜索和发现里显示的书籍封面为晋江默认封面，所以封面地址都删了，只留了详情页的正确封面

        iv: iv,
        mode: CryptoJS.mode.CBC,

    return JSON.parse(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.stringify(decryptedData));
}

ruleContent.content: .charpterContent@html@js:(result==null) ? '该内容需要验证VIP,请右上角登录或换源':result

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
   wordCount: o('.blue:eq(1)').replace('字',''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

searchUrl:
<js> var body = {
  "sort": "default",
  "page": 1,
  "q": "{{key}}",
  "rootKind": "",
  "query": "
    query getFilterWorksList($works_ids: [ID!]) {
      worksList(worksIds: $works_ids) {
        
    
    title
    cover
    url
    isBundle
    coverLabel
  
    
    url
    title
  
    
    author {
      name
      url
    }
    origAuthor {
      name
      url
    }
    translator {
      name
      url
    }
  
    
    abstract
    editorHighlight
  
    
    isOrigin
    kinds {
      
    name @skip(if: true)
    shortName @include(if: true)
    id
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      wordCount
      wordCountUnit
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      
    isEssay
    
    ... on EssayWorks {
      favorCount
    }
  
    
    isNew
    
    averageRating
    ratingCount
    url
  
  
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      isEssay
      onSaleTime
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        updateTime
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        isFinished
      }
    }
    ... on EssayWorks {
      essayActivityData {
        
    title
    uri
    tag {
      name
      color
      background
      icon2x
      icon3x
      iconSize {
        height
      }
      iconPosition {
        x y
      }
    }
  
      }
    }
    highlightTags {
      name
    }
  
    isInLibrary
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      ... on EbookWorks {
        id
        isPurchased
        isInWishlist
      }
    }
  
        id
        isOrigin
      }
    }
  ",
  "variables": {}
};
var option = {"method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(body) }; "https://read.douban.com/j/search_v2," + JSON.stringify(option) </js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
//取正文
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="[A-Z].*?">([\s\S]*?)\s<\/div>/)[1]).html();
//取屏蔽段落
var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);
//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/#.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母
.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")
.replace(/\/\/126/g,"V")
.replace(/\/\/125/g,"U")
.replace(/\/\/124/g,"T")
.replace(/\/\/123/g,"S")
.replace(/\/\/122/g,"R")
.replace(/\/\/121/g,"Q")
.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")
.replace(/\/\/117/g,"O")
.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/113/g,"K")
.replace(/\/\/112/g,"J")
.replace(/\/\/111/g,"I")
.replace(/\/\/110/g,"H")
.replace(/\/\/107/g,"G")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/100/g,"@")
//小写字母
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集/g,"")
.replace(/失败.*?浏览器！/g,"")
</js>

(书籍详情页->点右上角三点->拷贝URL)

◆编辑书源页->点右上三点->登录

◆点右上角的✔️，保存书源
◆刷新书籍详情页

<可请其他大佬补充一下自动获取这种书的Cookie>

<js>
//DES加密开始
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util  
);
with(javaImport){
function encryptByDES(massage, keydata) {
        let cipher = Cipher.getInstance("DES");
        let keySpec = new DESKeySpec(String(keydata).getBytes());
         let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
         let key = keyFactory.generateSecret(keySpec);      
        cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, key);
        return Base64.encodeToString(cipher.doFinal(String(massage).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP)
}
}
//DES加密结束

var deskey = 'web@hzlq';
var userId='0';
function getPostUrl(data,type) {
var url = 'http://m.ndlib.cn/nlc_read_home/service.do,';
var md5Key = 'library_2016@hzlq';
value = {
    siteId: 1,
    data:String(encryptByDES(JSON.stringify(data), deskey)),
    userId: userId,
    fromSource: 3,
    osType: 5,
    version: "1.0.1",
    versionCode: 10001,
    timeStamp: data.timeStamp,
    hashCode: String(java.md5Encode(data.timeStamp + md5Key))
}
var option={
"method":"POST",
"body":'cmd='+type+'&value=' + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(value))
}
return url + JSON.stringify(option);
}
var data ={
    timeStamp:Date.now(),
    bigType:"0",
    pageSize:100,
    pageNum:parseInt(java.get('page'))
};

if(baseUrl.match(/categoryId/)){
data.categoryId=baseUrl.match(/categoryId=(\d+)/)[1];
url=getPostUrl(data,'qryCategoryResList')
}else{
data.content=String(java.get('key'));
url=getPostUrl(data,'qrySearchList')
}

java.ajax(url)
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

");

bookSourceComment:
只看楼主
◎编辑书籍详情页，在简介内容填上 【只看楼主】  保存，刷新书籍页（有已缓存的正文记得正文也要刷新）
◎内容只有楼主发帖，无作者名时间等

去空行
◎层与层之间有一行空行，不想要空行的话
◎就在书籍详情页的简介内容填上【去空行】
◎只看楼主跟去空行随便怎么写，写对字就行

ruleContent.content:
&<js>
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="content">([\s\S]*?)\s&<\/div>/)[1]).html();
//取屏蔽段落
var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);
//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/##.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母
.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")
.replace(/\/\/126/g,"V")
.replace(/\/\/125/g,"U")
.replace(/\/\/124/g,"T")
.replace(/\/\/123/g,"S")
.replace(/\/\/122/g,"R")
.replace(/\/\/121/g,"Q")
.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")
.replace(/\/\/117/g,"O")
.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/113/g,"K")
.replace(/\/\/112/g,"J")
.replace(/\/\/111/g,"I")
.replace(/\/\/110/g,"H")
.replace(/\/\/107/g,"G")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/100/g,"@")
//小写字母
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集(，|)/g,"")
.replace(/失败.*?(阅读模式！|浏览器！)/g,"")
.replace(/禁止转码.*?请退出阅读模式！/g,"").replace(/chapter_c\(\)\;/g,"")
&</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:url'),
};
book;
</js>
